headline: GE Vernova Investor Day: The Stakes for the Stock Are Huge
summary: GE Vernova  has become a hot derivative play on the growing demand for electricity coming from power-hungry AI data centers.  Company management meets with investors on Tuesday evening to address the future.  Business execution by Vernova management has been excellent since the company spun out from  GE Aerospace  in early 2024.
